Class UFModel

UFModel Class

The base Eloquent data model, from which all UserFrosting data classes extend.

Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Model
UserFrosting\UFModel

Direct known subclasses

UserFrosting\Group, UserFrosting\GroupAuth, UserFrosting\SiteSettings, UserFrosting\User, UserFrosting\UserAuth, UserFrosting\UserEvent
